Articles.Content:
This has occurred for awhile but I never posted a report since its not game breaking (no crashes), just weird. Is this a feature (it would make sense to a point), or a bug?

This is going to sound weird but when I need to timewarp at the space center. nothing happens when I do timewarp. Time actually only warps when I'm moving the mouse around the screen. This has happened mods or no mods.

Also, it seems the loading screen sand castle is constantly showing (4 in 5 times). I thought it was odds of 1 to 40 for it to show.

Kethane (for 0.25, not using parts in my new saves, and will delete it later)
